title: Umarekawatta “Kensei” Wa Raku o Shitai - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Bodyguards   Calm Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Knights   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Power Struggle   Previous Life Talent   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sword And Magic
author: Sasa Togoro   笹 塔五郎
description:
Raul Isaulf, a boy who was reincarnated with memories of his previous life, now he is called Alta Schweiz and becomes the kingdom's youngest knight.

After battling for days in his past life, Alta works early and plans for early retirement, hoping to have a satisfying life if he has a new life.

The task given to Alta like that was escorting the 'Princess of the Kingdom' known as the strongest in the kingdom.>
